name: PGeo
tagline: Open source Python library for geographic services
body:
### Welcome to PGeo!
PGeo is a powerful open-source library providing functionality to:
1. Acquire public domain remotely sensed data from different data sources such as NASA NDVI/EVI satellite images
2. Processing and analysis of spatial data
3. Web visualization and analysis
4. Dissemination of spatial analytical results on the web


```javascript
console.log('Hello world!');
```

### Just a section
You can mention @simonefenix as istance. This is a link http://help.github.com/pages
